patthana22.32:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naanārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:5.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:7.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:8.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:9.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:9.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:10.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:11.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:11.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:12.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:13.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nacittavisaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho cittavisaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:13.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:14.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:14.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:15.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:16.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:16.3: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana22.32:17.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:17.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:18.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nocittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:18.3: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana22.32:19.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanocittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:19.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:20.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:21.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:21.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:22.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:23.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:23.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:24.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:25.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:25.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:26.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:26.3: Hetuyā ekādasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekādasa.
patthana22.32:27.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nabāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:27.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.32:28.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho upādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:28.3: Hetuyā pañcatiṃsa, adhipatiyā pañcatiṃsa … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate pañcatiṃsa.
patthana22.32:29.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanoupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:30.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinno dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.32:30.3: Ārammaṇe cha, anantare tīṇi … pe … upanissaye cha … pe … āhāre aṭṭhārasa, avigate aṭṭhārasa.
patthana22.32:31.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naanupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.32:31.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, sahajāte nissaye kamme … pe … magge vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekavīsa.
